getBitSizeOfVarUInt64¶

zserio.bitsizeof.getBitSizeOfVarUInt64(value)[source]¶

Gets bit size of variable 64-bit unsigned integer value.

Parameters:value – Value to use for bit size calculation.
Returns:Bit size of the value.
